scenes.name: Ordering at a Fast Food Restaurant
scenes.scenario: Ask about what the restaurant has, the price of different foods, and finally order something at this fast food restaurant scenario.
scenes.grammar: 你有没有...? 几块钱?, 来一个／我要一个

scenes.name: Meeting a New Friend
scenes.scenario: Welcome to Shanghai Airport! Looks like your taxi driver is over there waiting to pick you up. Why don't you head over and chat with him?
scenes.grammar: 你是哪里人, 你几岁, 你属什么, 你喜欢...?

scenes.name: Meeting Alex and Asking about Her Family
scenes.scenario: You and Alex have just met and you're curious to learn more about her family.
scenes.grammar: 你家有几口人?, 你的妈妈是哪里人?, 你的爸爸几岁?

scenes.name: Meeting David
scenes.scenario: There's a fellow student hanging out at the school cafeteria. Let's meet him!
scenes.grammar: 你叫什么名字?, 你住在哪里?, 你的电话号码...

scenes.name: Pre-assessment 1
scenes.scenario: Looks like there's a girl sitting by herself in the high school cafeteria. Why don't you try talking to her and see what you remember from last year?

scenes.name: Your Visit to Toronto
scenes.scenario: Welcome back from your trip to Toronto! Your friend David has picked you up at the airport and wants to hear all about what you did!
scenes.grammar: 你____了沒有?, 我__了, 我沒___

scenes.name: David's Visit to Taiwan
scenes.scenario: Didn't David just come back from Taiwan? Why don't you ask him some questions about his trip on your ride home on the subway?
